bankapp.bank

Interface Bank

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BankImpl

    public interface Bank
    The interface Bank defines the transaction methods of a bank.
    Author:
    Samuel Pulfer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeAccount(int nr, java.lang.String pin)
      Closes an account.
      void deposit(int nr, double amount)
      Deposits money into an account.
      java.util.List<Account> getAccounts()
      Gets the bank accounts.
      double getBalance(int nr, java.lang.String pin)
      Gets the balance of an account.

      Gets the transactions of an account.

      Opens a bank account.

      Withdraw money from an account.

    • Method Detail

      • closeAccount

        void closeAccount(int nr,
                  java.lang.String pin)
           throws BankException
        Closes an account.
        Parameters:
        nr - the account number
        pin - the PIN of the account
        Throws:
        BankException - if the account does not exist or the pin is invalid

      • deposit

        void deposit(int nr,
             double amount)
      throws BankException
        Deposits money into an account.
        Parameters:
        nr - the account number
        amount - the amount of money to deposit
        Throws:
        BankException - if the account does not exist or the amount could not be deposited

      • getAccounts

        java.util.List<Account> getAccounts()
        Gets the bank accounts.
        Returns:
        the bank accounts

      • getBalance

        double getBalance(int nr,
                  java.lang.String pin)
           throws BankException
        Gets the balance of an account.
        Parameters:
        nr - the account number
        pin - the PIN of the account
        Returns:
        the account balance, or null if an error occurred
        Throws:
        BankException - if the account does not exist or the pin is invalid

      • openAccount

        int openAccount(AccountType type,
                java.lang.String pin,
                double balance)
        Opens a bank account.
        Parameters:
        type - the account type
        pin - the PIN of the account
        balance - the initial balance
        Returns:
        the account number

      • withdraw

        void withdraw(int nr,
              java.lang.String pin,
              double amount)
       throws BankException
        Withdraw money from an account.
        Parameters:
        nr - the account number
        pin - the PIN of the account
        amount - the amount of money to withdraw
        Throws:
        BankException - if the account does not exist or the pin is invalid or the amount could not be withdrawn

      • getTransactions

        java.util.List<Transaction> getTransactions(int nr,
                                            java.lang.String pin)
                                     throws BankException
        Gets the transactions of an account.
        Parameters:
        nr - the account number
        pin - the PIN of the account
        Returns:
        the account transactions
        Throws:
        BankException - if the account does not exist or the pin is invalid
